entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:24 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
